summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CAPTURE PWA Premium UI update. All features working correctly: premium login page with dark runner background, CAPTURE branding, real brand logos on map markers and scratch cards, dark/light mode toggle with persistence, and profile picture upload with camera icon.
seed_data_creation: None required - brand territories are hardcoded in GameContext.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All premium UI features verified working. Dark mode uses CartoDB Dark Matter tiles. Brand logos are from customer-assets.emergentagent.com and proxied via /api/proxy-image for CORS. The Whole Truth territories are in Koramangala area (south of Indiranagar) - need to zoom out/pan to see them.

login_page_premium_design.details: Dark runner background image, CAPTURE branding (not C logo), premium glassmorphism form

signup_page_accessible.details: Sign Up form accessible via 'Sign up' link, matches premium design

map_displays_7_brand_territories.details: 7 brand territories: MuscleBlaze (3), Super You (2), The Whole Truth (2)

muscleblaze_scratch_card_logo.details: MuscleBlaze scratch card shows actual uploaded MB logo (hdwrq9jx_images-2.png)

superyou_scratch_card_logo.details: Super You scratch card shows actual uploaded red logo (qderkt0t_channels4_profile.jpg)

thewholetruth_scratch_card_logo.details: The Whole Truth scratch card shows actual uploaded purple logo (en3r28t5_images-4.png)

dark_light_mode_toggle.details: Toggle works from Profile page, shows Sun/Moon icon, toast notification on change

theme_persistence.details: Theme persists in localStorage ('capture_theme') and survives page refresh

profile_picture_upload_camera_icon.details: Camera icon badge visible on profile picture, hidden file input for upload

dark_mode_map_tiles.details: Map uses CartoDB Dark Matter tiles when dark mode is enabled

mocked_apis.authentication: User login/signup is MOCKED - any email/password works
